title: Why Decentralized Government?
text: It allows for the exchange of data freely where the subject of the data is provably in control of who can access that data.

section.title: Have more transparency
section.content: It allows for the exchange of data to be in the open increasing accountabilty for both citizens and govermental entities.

section.title: Have more security
section.content: Using cryptography we can assure that the data has not been tampered with and it will be immutable.

section.title: Control your data.
section.content: It allows for individual to control their data and by requiering consent or dissent every time an entity wants to access their data.

section.title: Save time on procedures
section.content: Using a platform like this will enable to streamline workflows and request for citizen services.
